Purpose: Quantitative measurement of beta-2-microglobulin as a tumor marker and indicator of renal function and immune status.
Container: Red-top, serum separator (SST), or heparin (green-top) tube for blood; sterile container for random or 24-hour urine
Equipment: Immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Siemens ADVIA Centaur XP, Abbott Architect), refrigerated centrifuge, calibrated pipettes
